noADDENDUM.Provisional statement of French Tonnage.All French Vessels of 500 Gross Tons and over as shownhy Lloyds Register as at 30th June, 1939.Number Gross tonnage tankers 57 322,000Others 611 2,480,000Total 668 2.803,000Losses of French Vessels by enemy action since theoutbreak of war and up to midnight 29th/30th October, 1939:-Tankers 1 14,000Others 5 28,000Total 6 42,000Two Enemy Cargo Vessels with a total gross tonnage of10,000 have been captured by the French.
